meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a tart
meanings.sent1: The tarty dessert had a tangy flavor.
meanings.sent2: She wore a tarty dress with bright colors.
meanings.sent3: The tarty pie was so sour, it made everyone pucker.
meanings.sent4: Her tarty attitude left a bitter taste in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The tarty scent of the bakery drew customers in from the street.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of taste or decency
meanings.sent1: His tarty behavior at the party was embarrassing.
meanings.sent2: The movie had some tarty scenes that made me cringe.
meanings.sent3: She made a tarty comment that offended everyone.
meanings.sent4: The tarty jokes he told were not appropriate for the audience.
meanings.sent5: The tarty graffiti on the wall was distasteful and disrespectful.

meanings.definition: Wearing clothing or makeup that is overly provocative or revealing
meanings.sent1: She felt uncomfortable in the tarty outfit she was wearing.
meanings.sent2: The actress received criticism for her tarty red carpet look.
meanings.sent3: He always chooses the most tarty outfits for Halloween.
meanings.sent4: Her tarty makeup drew attention wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The tarty dress she wore to the event caused quite a stir among the guests.
